meanings.definition: To intervene on behalf of another.
meanings.sent1: I will intercede with the teacher to help my friend.
meanings.sent2: She always intercedes in arguments to make peace.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to intercede in the dog's barking match.
meanings.sent4: The sun interceded between the clouds, shining brightly.
meanings.sent5: The superhero interceded just in time to save the day.

meanings.sent1: The counselor will intercede between the two students fighting.
meanings.sent2: He often intercedes in family disagreements to find a solution.
meanings.sent3: The robot tried to intercede in the chess game between the siblings.
meanings.sent4: The river interceded between the two lands, creating a natural border.
meanings.sent5: The wise elder interceded and helped the villagers resolve their conflict.

meanings.definition: To plead on behalf of someone else.
meanings.sent1: I will intercede with the judge for my friend's innocence.
meanings.sent2: She intercedes for those who cannot speak up for themselves.
meanings.sent3: The parrot tried to intercede for more crackers by mimicking a sad face.
meanings.sent4: The moon interceded, casting a soft light on the dark night.
meanings.sent5: The loyal dog interceded by barking at the stranger approaching the house.
